definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能時開始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: She was thunderstruck to hear the news.
sentences.chinese: 得知消息時她大感驚訝。

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 這兩名男子均在將死雞屍體餵狗時直接接觸了死雞。

sentences.english: Two jockeys were thrown in the second race.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個騎師在第二場賽馬時摔了下來。

sentences.english: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 測定了龍竹竹材在不同熱壓溫度下乾燥時的溫度分佈。

sentences.english: Reductions in staffing at the major banks.
sentences.chinese: 在裁減人員時的主要銀行。

sentences.english: He felt browned off when he heard that he waw dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 當他聽到自己被解職時感到很不痛快。

sentences.english: Adjust the density (amount of ink) of the print.
sentences.chinese: 調整打印時墨點的密度。

sentences.english: When the wind blows , the slender tree bends but never breaks.
sentences.chinese: 起風時，這棵細長的樹常彎曲但決不會斷。

sentences.english: When the markets opened the following Monday, the Dow bid adieu to 10000 for good.
sentences.chinese: 股市在緊接着的週一開盤時就告別了10000點。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯對陣烏迪內斯的比賽時我能復出吧。

sentences.english: During the Jin dynasty, a boy, called Mao Bao, was born into an impoverished family.
sentences.chinese: 晉朝時，有一位名叫毛寶的小男孩，家境十分貧困。

sentences.english: Surely applying a thin layer of antifriction when installing sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在裝軸套時，在軸上塗上一薄層減摩劑。

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 當利爾登閱讀評論時，麗塔複述爾登背誦的東西。

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 電機過熱時，熱保護器將會中斷電流。

definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
